app.name: AI Health Companion
app.tagline: Your Partner in Health. Health. Simplified
landing.hero.title: Your Partner in Health.
landing.hero.subtitle: Health. Simplified
landing.hero.description: Experience healthcare like never before with our AI-powered health companion. Get personalized health insights, book appointments, and manage your wellness journey—all in one place.
landing.features.title: Everything You Need for Better Health
landing.features.subtitle: Comprehensive health management tools designed to make your healthcare journey seamless and stress-free
landing.feature.aiCompanion.title: AI Health Companion
landing.feature.aiCompanion.description: Chat with our intelligent AI assistant for instant health guidance and support 24/7
landing.feature.appointments.title: Easy Appointments
landing.feature.appointments.description: Book and manage appointments with healthcare providers seamlessly with WhatsApp reminders
landing.feature.tracking.title: Health Tracking
landing.feature.tracking.description: Monitor your health metrics and get personalized insights to improve your wellness
landing.feature.resources.title: Health Resources
landing.feature.resources.description: Access a library of trusted health articles, tips, and educational content
landing.feature.secure.title: Secure & Private
landing.feature.secure.description: Your health data is encrypted and protected with industry-leading security standards
landing.feature.family.title: Family Care
landing.feature.family.description: Manage health records for your entire family from a single dashboard
landing.cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Health Journey?
landing.cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust us with their healthcare needs
landing.footer.copyright: © 2024 AI Health Companion. All rights reserved.
auth.signup.title: Create Account
auth.signup.subtitle: Join us and start your health journey today
auth.signup.passwordHint: Must be at least 8 characters long
auth.login.title: Welcome Back
auth.login.subtitle: Sign in to continue your health journey
dashboard.bookAppointment.description: Schedule next visit, get reminders via WhatsApp
dashboard.talkToAI: Talk to your AI Health Companion
